page.title: 13SPORT IN THE BACK DISTRICT
page.content: {FOOTBALL} The main focus of football in the area is{Back Football & Recreation Club}- a voluntary organisation managed by an elected committee. The club has its own pitch and hall, which is a focus for community activity. In summer, matches are played against teams from other districts, and rivalry is very fierce, particularly against Ness. Some people take football seriously. {NETBALL} Netball is played every summer for girls at different schools.Both primary and secondary have a tournament each year. {SWIMMING} In the summer people go to the shore to swim.Some people take their boats down when the sea is calm.
